::Slaughter::

    Slaughter couldn't recall anything too valuable, but he figured he
should at least tell them who he wanted revenge on and stuff.  Menasor's
hand around his head really hurt.

     "Hrrr.......I was once a bot in the Alliance, named Skulletron.  My
beast mode was a hyena.  But I was no ordinary transformer.  I had and still
have the ability to "connect" my mind with another's and send them images,
sounds and other things, and I usually used the ability to get me out of a
situation or persuade another being.  Ha....This ability would be quite
useful to any faction.......So, Decepticons, kill me, but please.....I have
a favor to ask of you........I want you to avenge my previous death as
Skulletron........Two maximals......Two......maximals...........Torca and
Klant.......Kill them....." Slaughter said.
----- Original Message -----
From: "robertdahl" <rdahl@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 28, 2001 1:03 AM
Subject: Re: Shockwave


> Megatron looked at Slaughter, only the side of his face that was ruined
> could be seen. Meshes of wire overlapped some remaining armour. Some of
> the endoskelleton structure moved, as it would when he smiled.
> "If just to please my new alliance." Megatron laughed, then looked at
> Slaughter. "If you have anything valuable to say about who you once
> were, say it now, before Menasor relieves you off your head." Megatron
> said Bluntly.
>
> At this Menasor understood. He brought his other hand overtop, and
> closed it around Slaughter's head, a hand capable of excerting over 100
> tons per square inch of pressurs, and waiting for the word. He hand
> engulfed the top of Slaughter's head.
>
